short_summary: REQUEST FOR INFORMATION REGARDING ADAPT LEARNING TOOL FOR ESDC
description: Employment and Social Development College has undertaken a pilot project to test the Adapt authoring tool, and now they are requesting for information about suppliers who can enhance their Adapt instance, to meet the accessible and bilingual needs.
